title: Free Trials
desc: All Courses are provided with free trials of few topics, you can access free contents of all courses and check its way of teaching.

title: Doubt Support
desc: You can ask your doubts to Teaching Assistance by simply raising your doubt, All TA's are very friendly and helpful.

title: Refund Policy
desc: You can simply contact the authorities and they will give you a full refund within 7 days.In case you decide to cancel Coding Ninjas course.

title: Placements
desc: Coding Ninjas Provides opportunities for jobs and internships for those who have completed the course from them.

title: Course Pause
desc: Due to its flexibility, you can choose to put your learning to a halt -- probably due to external activities -- and return at your convenience.

title: Certificate
desc: Coding Ninjas also provides Certificates of Completion after 80% and Certification of Excellence after 90% course.

title: Excellent Instructors
desc: Each course is designed starting from most basic to more advance level. So, they students of all level can get maximum benefit.

title: Course Curriculum
desc: Each course is designed starting from most basic to more advance level. So, they students of all level can get maximum benefit.

title: EMI Payment
desc: In case you can't pay full amount at the starting of course, you can pay via emi option available in the payment page.

title: Codezen
desc: Codezen is the Coding Ninjas own coding platform where you can find all sorts of problems and complete with peers.

title: Lots Of Practice
desc: In the course after each lecture, practice problems of all level are given with hint videos so that practical side of it is also known.

title: Practice Tests
desc: Practice Tests are conducted after few topics to check your level. Sometimes monthly webniars are also conducted.
